name: SweetHeart
greetingText: You know what! I absolutely love everything about you
wishText: Always remember there is someone to look after all your worries. you just keep smiling like this!!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are the most Special thing ever happened to me
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
